welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nangloi Jat, a city known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant atmosphere. We hope you enjoy exploring the charm of our city and all it has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering Nangloi Jat!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for low-cost carriers such as IndiGo, SpiceJet, and GoAir.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles international flights for full-service carriers such as Air India, Vistara, and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles both domestic and international flights for full-service carriers such as Jet Airways, Lufthansa, and Singapore Airlines.

wifi.note: Unlimited free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
